name: cup-updates
description: Cup is a lightweight, self-hosted online pastebin service that supports syntax highlighting and temporary or permanent pastes. It focuses on simplicity, privacy, and a clean UI for sharing code or text snippets via a web interface.
features: Syntax Highlighting: Beautiful code display for multiple languages. Developer-friendly presentation.
Temporary Pastes: Create self-destructing snippets for privacy. Share securely.
Permanent Storage: Keep important pastes available long-term. Flexible retention.
Clean Interface: Minimalist design focused on content. No distractions.
Privacy-Focused: No tracking or unnecessary data collection. Your pastes stay private.
Self-Hosted: Run your own pastebin service. Complete ownership and control.
